slides.title: Class of 2025 Graduate
slides.description: This is a photo from my graduation, where I received my Master’s degree in Computer Science from Michigan State University—just one year after earning my Bachelor’s degree in the same field.

slides.title: MSU Teaching Assistant
slides.description: During my time at MSU, I was a TA for CSE 335: Object-Oriented Software Design (C++) and CSE 477: Web Application Architecture and Development (JavaScript).

slides.title: Team Techsmith Capstone Project
slides.description: My senior capstone team won an award for our project video. Our application allows users to upload and edit video files through text commands using the Azure OpenAI API.

slides.title: AI Engineer Internship
slides.description: In the summer of 2024, I was an AI and Automation intern at ZF. I developed an knowledge sharing platform for the Continuous Improvement System.
